articles.title: American Trespasser Detained
articles.content:
American Trespasser Detained
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- An American was detained for trespassing on the border of the DPRK with China on Jan. 25.
					 He is now under investigation by an organ concerned.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Conveys Sympathy to Ethiopian President
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Girma Wolde-Giorgis, President of Ethiopia, in connection with the recent crash of an Ethiopian airliner that claimed huge casualties.
					Kim in the message expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the president, the victims and the bereaved families.

articles.title: Reception Given for Chinese Embassies
articles.content:
Reception Given for Chinese Embassies
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Ministry gave a reception in honor of staff members of the Chinese embassy here on Wednesday on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Present on invitation were Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, said in his speech at the reception that last year, "the year of DPRK-China Friendship," the DPRK and China held colorful events and exchanged delegations of various levels, powerfully demonstrating the solid and viable DPRK-China relations of friendship and cooperation. 
					
					 He recalled that the Chinese people demonstrated once again the might of the unity of the Chinese nation through the celebrations of the 60th founding anniversary of the Republic.
					
					 We will join Chinese comrades in working hard to boost the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations in the future, too, as intended by the top leaders of the two countries, he stressed.
					
					 Liu Xiaoming in his reply said that last year was of importance in the Sino-DPRK relations, referring to the fact that the two countries jointly marked the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties and the year of friendship.
					
					 He noted that the two countries have maintained excellent cooperation in the international arena and made a positive contribution to the steady development of the Sino-DPRK relations and regional peace and stability.
					
					 Saying that 2010 is a significant year for the two countries, he wished the Korean people greater successes in socialist construction under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: General Offensive Guaranteed by Songun
articles.content:
General Offensive Guaranteed by Songun
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Early in January General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited a sub-unit of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division and construction sites of the Huichon Power Station to appreciate servicepersons for their feats in military service and the project and encourage them to continue doing a good job.
					 Inspired by the news, all the Korean service personnel have renewed their determination to guarantee the people's happiness with arms and do their bit as the main force of the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause in efforts for building a thriving nation.
					
					 Following them, who have made a breakthrough in difficult sectors of the building of a thriving nation, the working people across the country have also registered good results in their work from the outset of the year for the purpose of making a leap in light and agricultural industries this year.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who started the Songun revolutionary leadership many years ago with an inspection of a KPA unit, has adhered to the principle of giving priority to the military affairs in the revolution and construction.
					
					 He made public a famous work titled "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-victorious Banner of Our Revolution" in January 29, Juche 92 (2003) to formulate an idea and theory that the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea is a unique political mode based on the Songun idea of President Kim Il Sung and his exploits in the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics the DPRK has become an invincible socialist country, a political and military power with a strong war deterrent and the single-hearted unity, where all the sectors have developed in reliance upon the economic power with defense industry as its core.

articles.title: Strong Defense Power Is Symbol of DPRK's Sovereignty
articles.content:
Strong Defense Power Is Symbol of DPRK's Sovereignty
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has fully displayed its invincible might with strong defense capacities, while giving priority to the military affairs, which means Songun. The defense power that has been strengthened in many years of Songun and through the fierce anti-imperialist struggle guarantees the successful building of a thriving nation and the people's happiness and constitutes a symbol of the country's sovereignty. 
					 It enables the DPRK to exercise its sovereignty to the full.
					
					 The DPRK's is a history of fully demonstrating its invincible military strength as a fortress of independence.
					
					 With the army and people united in mind on the basis of the Songun idea, the DPRK has advanced the revolution and construction in its own way, overcoming all sorts of trials and countering the U.S. imperialists' tough policy with tougher one.
					
					 The DPRK's history of Songun shows that if they have a strong military strength and unshakable unity in mind, they have nothing to fear and can safeguard the interests of their country in any adversity.
					
					 The strong defense capabilities inspire the Korean people with a great national dignity and pride.
					
					 The Korean people have their spirit of national independence and dignity based on their absolute conviction of the strong defense capabilities, which also lend an impetus to the economic growth of the country.
					
					 The DPRK, which has already become a military power, is dynamically pushing ahead with the building of a strong economy.
					
					 The army, the main force of the Korean revolution and the vanguard in the effort for building a thriving nation, has performed heroic feats in difficult sectors of the socialist construction. Inspired by the revolutionary soldier spirit, all the people are effecting a great upsurge in the same effort.

articles.title: US Accused of Escalating Arms Race
articles.content:
US Accused of Escalating Arms Race
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- A new arms race now under way in the international arena is entirely attributable to the U.S. policy of military hegemony and strength, observes Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed commentary.
					 The U.S. is frantically stepping up the development, production and deployment of new type modern weapons in a sinister bid to realize its wild ambition for world domination, counting on its upperhand of strength, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 By rounding off the establishment of the missile defense (MD) system the U.S. seeks to put the world within the range of its missile attack and mount a preemptive attack on any country any time.
					
					 The U.S. claims that the MD is aimed at "protecting" the Mideast and Europe from "a missile threat" from some countries. This is nothing but sheer sophism to cover up its aggressive and criminal nature.
					
					 It is now busy increasing military pressure upon the DPRK and a number of countries in the Mideast and Latin America and laying a military siege to the Eurasian Continent through the expansion of the NATO towards the east. This is escalating the international tension to an extreme phase and driving the world to an uncontrollable arms race and another Cold War.
					
					 The U.S. madcap arms expansion is designed to step up its policy of aggression and military supremacy.
					
					 It is describing its intensified moves for aggression and military intervention including arms buildup and the establishment of the MD as moves for its "security" and the "protection" of its allies. This is nothing but a charade intended to misrepresent injustice as justice. 
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. cover up its true colors as the arch criminal escalating the arms race and international tension and disturbing the world peace and security.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Behave Themselves
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Behave Themselves
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative group is openly pursuing the confrontation of systems and the wild ambition for invading the north, diametrically going against the trend of the times and challenging its efforts to improve the inter-Korean ties. This is driving the situation to an extreme phase of confrontation and escalating the tension.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 Absolutely unpardonable are the south Korean conservative ruling forces as they are hell-bent on the confrontation of systems and the moves to unleash a war of aggression against the north, chilling the atmosphere of warming the inter-Korean relations created thanks to the positive efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 The racket of confrontation with the DPRK kicked up by the south Korean conservative authorities is nothing but an undisguised act to bedevil the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The true colors of the south Korean conservative group as traitors are brought to daylight as they have worked with bloodshot eyes to dampen the growing desire of the fellow countrymen for independent reunification and stem the trend of the times towards the improved inter-Korean ties.
					
					 The above-said row of the south Korean conservative authorities is a clear revelation of their invariable scenario for invading the north.
					
					 The DPRK is calling for reconciliation, cooperation, dialogue and improved inter-Korean ties. But the south Korean authorities are only hatching plots to harm fellow countrymen at any cost, letting loose a string of extremely bellicose outbursts, blinded with the ambition to invade the north.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group's invariable scenario for invading the north is one of the main reasons why the inter-Korean relations have not got rid of the vicious cycle of confrontation and tension. 
					
					 The process for warming the inter-Korean relations leads to patriotism while confrontation and war lead to treachery and self-destruction.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to behave themselves, properly facing up to history and reality.

articles.title: Improved Korean Relations Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Improved Korean Relations Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Sang Gun, permanent representative of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, called a press conference in Seoul on Jan. 23 to urge the need to make efforts for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations.
					 It is of very weighty importance in the improvement of the inter-Korean relations to significantly mark the 10th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration, he said, adding:
					
					 The preparations to celebrate the day with splendor are now brisk underway. What is most important here is for the south Korean authorities to make sincere approach toward it.
					
					 The authorities should opt for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, far from persisting in barring the said relations from being improved while rejecting communications with the people.

articles.title: US Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy
articles.content:
US Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- Organizations for peace and reunification movement of south Korea held the 246th anti-U.S. and anti-war Friday rally for the pullback of the U.S. forces in front of the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Jan. 22.
					 A resolution read out at the rally referred to the fact that the DPRK in the recent statement of its Foreign Ministry proposed to the parties to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks for replacing the AA by a peace treaty.
					
					 It noted that had a durable peace regime been established earlier on the Korean Peninsula, the nuclear issue would not have surfaced. 
					
					 Saying that the U.S. is to blame for tension and confrontation on the peninsula, it urged the U.S. to admit this and take a measure to replace the AA with a peace treaty as soon as possible.
					
					 The U.S. attitude casts doubt as to whether it truly wants the denuclearization and peace regime or not, it noted.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to lift sanctions against the DPRK and drop the hostile policy toward it, far from persistently forcing it to "dismantle its nukes first".
					
					 The resolution stressed that the people from all walks of life would positively launch the struggle for peace and reunification by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: DPRK FM Statement Supported
articles.content:
DPRK FM Statement Supported
 Pyongyang, January 28 (KCNA) -- The Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador issued a statement on Jan. 18 and S. N. Sserwanga, secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, on Jan. 20 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 The Canar Provincial Institute in the statement said that it hopes to see the imperialists' hostile policy towards the DPRK and their provocations against the latter terminated as well as the present state of war put to an end with the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. in 2010.
					
					 The statement pointed out that the institute would positively conduct solidarity activities in support of the peaceful proposal of the DPRK.
					
					 S. N. Sserwanga, secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, in the statement said that the DPRK Foreign Ministry proposed to the parties to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty this year marking the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean war, adding that this proposal is the most reasonable and just measure. 
					
					 Expressing full support for the sincere proposal of the DPRK, he called upon the governments and progressive political parties and organizations of all the countries in the world to express positive solidarity with the proposal.
					
					 Kamal Hyder, secretary general of the Bangladesh Peace Council, issued a statement on Jan. 20 in support of the statement released by the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					
					 He in the statement stressed that the proposal of the DPRK to conclude a peace treaty provides a reasonable way for comprehensively and fully implementing the September 19 Joint Statement.
					
					 He expressed full support and solidarity with the stand of the DPRK to continue to make sincere efforts to persuade the parties concerned into accepting its realistic proposal based on experience and lesson.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recorre la vialidad de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recorre la vialidad de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recorrio las carreteras de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Tras pasar revista a las carreteras nuevamente pavimentadas, evaluo altamente los meritos de los constructores quienes acabaron en un corto plazo con las propias fuerzas esa obra de gran envergadura mostrandose muy satisfecho de que esas vias hayan sido construidas de modo original conforme al sentido estetico contemporaneo.
					
					En los ultimos anos, en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte se lograron cambios sorprendentes en la proteccion territorial y medioambiental, incluyendo la construccion de la vialidad y la creacion de areas boscosas, senalo.
					
					Ademas, -prosiguio- se han acondicionado ordenada y hermosamente las ciudades, las aldeas, los rios y las carreteras de esta provincia.
					
					 Esta realidad orgullosa comprueba claramente la justeza y la inagotable vitalidad de la politica de nuestro partido sobre la administracion del territorio nacional y, al mismo tiempo, deviene la manifestacion de la conviccion y la voluntad ferreas del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de construir sin falta una gran potencia prospera socialista en el territorio patrio con sus propias fuerzas, recalco.
					
					El Dirigente presento las tareas para hacer mas hermoso y rico el territorio patrio.
					
					Enseno que la proteccion territorial y medioambiental es un asunto importante para facilitar al pueblo las condiciones de vida mas independientes y creativas al proteger activamente el territorio nacional, los recursos y el medioambiente de acuerdo con la aspiracion y la demanda de los habitantes y al explotarlos y usarlos de modo racional.
					
					Por lo tanto, todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo deben impulsarla continua y dinamicamente, apunto.
					
					Encomendo encarecidamente a todos los sectores y unidades que prestaran profunda atencion a la administracion territorial para legar a las generaciones venideras un territorio patrio mas pintoresco y confortable para vivir.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, los jefes y primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Retenido estadounidense infiltrado ilegalmente en Corea
articles.content:
S 012808 - Retenido estadounidense infiltrado ilegalmente en Corea
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ATCC) -- El dia 25, fue retenido un norteamericano que ha entrado ilegalmente en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por la zona fronteriza entre esta y China.
					 Un organo competente esta investigando ahora ese caso.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencias al presidente etiope
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de condolencias al presidente etiope
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 28 un telegrama de condolencias al presidente de la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia, Girma Woldegiorgis, por muchas perdidas humanas ocasionadas por la reciente caida de un avion etiope.
					El remitente expreso profunda compasion y condolencias al destinatario, las victimas y sus familiares.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de agravante de carrera armamentista
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de agravante de carrera armamentista
Pyongyang, 28 de enero (ATCC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este jueves, el diario Rodong Sinmun preciso que el hegemonismo militar y la politica de fuerza de Estados Unidos devienen el factor de la nueva carrera armamentista que se genera actualmente en la arena internacional. 
					 EE.UU. impulsa desenfrenadamente el desarrollo, la produccion y el emplazamiento de nuevas armas modernas para satisfacer su siniestra ambicion de dominar el mundo a base de su superioridad de la fuerza, adelanta el comentarista y prosigue: 
					
					 En particular, trata de poner el mundo al alcance de sus misiles mediante el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles con el proposito de atacar preventivamente con esos artefactos a cualesquier paises en cualquier momento.
					
					 Sin embargo, el imperio miente que el sistema antimisiles es para "proteger" el Medio Oriente y Europa de la supuesta "amenaza de misiles" de alguien. Esto no es mas que una sofisteria para encubrir el caracter agresivo y criminal de esa red de defensa antimisil. 
					
					 Ahora, EE.UU. endurece la presion militar en la Peninsula Coreana, el Medio Oriente y America Latina y forma un cerco militar sobre el continente euroasiatico a traves de la expansion al este de la OTAN. Estas maniobras agravan al maximo la tension internacional y lleva el mundo a la irreparable carrera armamentista y la guerra fria.
					
					 Por otra parte, aumenta sus gastos militares con el fin de intensificar su politica de agresion y hegemonia militar. 
					
					 Sin embargo, describe el aumento de sus fuerzas armadas, el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles y otras maniobras de agresion e intervencion militar como medidas para preservar la "seguridad" nacional y "proteger" a los paises aliados. Esto no pasa de ser una farsa para convertir lo injusto en lo justo. 
					
					Aunque EE.UU. pronuncie muchas palabras agradables, no podra ocultar jamas su naturaleza de agravante de la carrera armamentista y la tension internacional y de destructor principal de la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
